Summary Note:
Peters Janssens Hermans and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Brussels. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
Having worked for over 46 years, Peters Janssens Hermans brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Peters Janssens Hermans is currently divorced. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Peters completed his secondary education at Institut Saint-Joseph in 1974.
Peters completed his university education at Université catholique de Louvain in 1979.
Peters earned his additionally degree from Académie des Beaux-Arts de Tournai in 1984.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 46 years, Peters Janssens Hermans has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Peters Janssens Hermans began his professional journey as a Assistant Designer at Walter Van Beirendonck BVBA in 1979, laying the foundation for future success.
At Stella McCartney Belgium, he held the position of Senior Designer from 1985 till retirement, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 740000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has condo located in Maaseik, worth 1010000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Maaseik worth 2070000 EUR.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Herstal, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The condo is valued at 830000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Peters as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
